phrase: You came to me again? Do you really like me too?
Trust me, I've got a lot of sins. I'm not as good as you are.
Although I must admit, your attention makes my heart race...

3.text: [you are winking to the mare; seems like, she didn't expect that.]

phrase: You ... you've just winked to me, right? Was it my imagination?

5.text: [You're casually stretching, displaying your bottom and hoping that nobopy else is watching at you.]

phrase: Oh, it was a low blow, darling...
For a rematch I will have to try very hard...
Oh...what am I saiyng... You're untouchable!
I'll be killed, if I do anything to you!

10.text: [You smile and wink to the mare again. She seems almost broken.]

phrase: You know... I think, nopony will be mind, if they don't even know about this...
You really want this as much as I do?

14.text: [You nod in agreement, and she immediately gets up from her seat.]

phrase: Follow me, I know one secluded place...

16.text: [You suddenly leave without saying goodbye. The mare doesn't look upset at all.]
